entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 a.m. MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 21. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
